text: American Psycho is a conceptual novel by Jason Huff, Mimi Cabell and Bret Easton Ellis, published in 2012 by Traumawien. The book was part of Erreur d’impression at the Jeu de Paume, Paris in 2012 and received international attention. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:2012 novels |left|650x650px
title: American Psycho (conceptual novel)
